pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Texture Styling Foam 150ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf Extra Care Texture Styling Texturising Foam Strong Hold protects the hair from drying out.

Schwarzkopf Extra Care offers a range of innovative styling products that help you create your desired hairstyle. The professional formula give you reliable long-lasting styling results, whilst protecting your hair from damage or drying out, so you can walk out the door looking like the best version of yourself - every day, every time.

- Bouncy, defined waves for touchable look.

- 48H strong hold.

- Lightweight, without stickiness & easy to brush out.

Textured finish. Wavy styles.

Protects the hair from drying out.

48H hold & care formula.

Size: 150mL

Ingredients

Aqua, Propylene Glycol, VP/VA Copolymer, Alcohol denat., Glycerin, Polyquaternium-11, Caffeine, Taurine, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Acrylamidopropyltrimonium Chloride/Acrylamide Copolymer, PEG-32, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Lactic Acid, Panthenol, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Hydrolyzed Soybean Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Pantolactone, Biotin.

Directions

Shake bottle well before use. Dispense foam in palms and spread through the hair, distributing it evenly from root to tip. Start with 2-3 pumps, using more or less depending on length and texture of hair. Scrunch or tousle style as desired. Blow dry or let the hair dry naturally.
